mapper.select:
select id, code, hospital_name, hospital_area, hospital_img, hospital_dean_name, hospital_year, hospital_nature, hospital_grade, hospital_offices_num, medical_insurance_num, hospital_bed_num, outpatient_num, is_medical_insurance, hospital_equipment, hospital_about, hospital_honor, hospital_url, hospital_phone, hospital_address, hospital_post_code, hospital_bus_route, is_open, images, longitude, latitude from hospital_info where 1 = 1
AND hospital_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{hospitalInfo.hospitalName},'%')
AND hospital_area LIKE CONCAT('%',#{hospitalInfo.hospitalArea},'%')
AND hospital_nature LIKE CONCAT('%',#{hospitalInfo.hospitalNature},'%')
AND hospital_grade LIKE CONCAT('%',#{hospitalInfo.hospitalGrade},'%')
order by hospital_name desc

select id, hospital_name, hospital_img, hospital_nature, hospital_grade, hospital_address, images, longitude, latitude from hospital_info where 1 = 1
AND (hospital_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{key},'%') OR address LIKE CONCAT('%',#{key},'%'))
AND longitude is not null AND latitude is not null order by hospital_name desc
